thread.title: Pence thanks Trudeau for support of strikes in Syria

title: Pence thanks Trudeau for support of strikes in Syria
text:
Pence thanks Trudeau for support of strikes in Syria Saturday, April 14, 2018 - 01:31 
U.S. Vice President Mike Pence tells Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau that Canada's support of U.S. allied action against chemical weapons facilities in Syria ''is much appreciated and welcomed.'' Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
U.S. Vice President Mike Pence tells Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau that Canada's support of U.S. allied action against chemical weapons facilities in Syria "is much appreciated and welcomed." Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2JMRUH1
